SEARCH
Package Characters

Class Character

java.lang.Object
Characters.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClanChief, Gallic, Korrigan, Lycanthrope, Roman, Sphinx
public abstract class Character extends Object
Abstract base class representing any character in the simulation (Gaul, Roman, or Creature). It defines common attributes like health, strength, and common actions like fighting or eating.

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(String name, Gender gender, double height, int age, int strength, int endurance, int health, int hunger, int belligerence, int magicPotionLevel)
      Constructs a new Character with specific stats.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the character.
      gender - The gender of the character.
      height - The height in meters.
      age - The age in years.
      strength - The physical strength.
      endurance - The physical endurance.
      health - The current health points (0-100).
      hunger - The current hunger level (0-100).
      belligerence - The current belligerence/aggressiveness level.
      magicPotionLevel - The current level of magic potion effect.

    • getType

      public abstract String getType()
      Returns:
      A string description of the specific character type (e.g., "Roman Legionnaire").

    • fight

      public void fight(Character opponent)
      Engages in combat with another character. Calculates damage based on strength and endurance. Considers magic potion effects (invincibility and strength boost).
      Parameters:
      opponent - The character to fight against.

    • cure

      public void cure(int careAmount)
      Heals the character by a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      careAmount - The amount of health to restore.

    • eat

      public void eat(FoodItem food)
      Consumes a food item. Applies effects on hunger, health, and belligerence. Enforces rules about fresh food and consecutive vegetables.
      Parameters:
      food - The food item to eat.

    • drinkMagicPotion

      public void drinkMagicPotion(int quantity)
      Consumes magic potion. Handles positive effects (health, hunger) and overdose risk (Granite Statue).
      Parameters:
      quantity - The amount of potion consumed.

    • checkTrepas

      public void checkTrepas()
      Checks if the character's health has dropped to zero or below. Triggers passAway() if true.

    • passAway

      public void passAway()
      Handles the character's death.

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Returns:
      true if the character is dead (health less than or equal to 0).

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
